description:
exp/locale/collate: added indices to builder for reusing blocks between locales.
Refactored build + buildTrie into build + buildOrdering.
Note that since the tailoring code is not checked in yet, all tailorings are identical
to root.  The table therefore should not and does not grow at this point.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6500087/diff/5001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go
File src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6500087/diff/5001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go#newcode49
src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go:49: ctElemMap   map[string]int
don't put the type in the name; it's noise. ctHandle, ctElem.
comments on these fields would be nice too.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6500087/diff/5001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go
File src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6500087/diff/5001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go#newcode49
src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/build/builder.go:49: ctElemMap   map[string]int
On 2012/09/07 18:01:09, r wrote:
> don't put the type in the name; it's noise. ctHandle, ctElem.
> comments on these fields would be nice too.

Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0a0666f2fe86 ***

exp/locale/collate: added indices to builder for reusing blocks between locales.
Refactored build + buildTrie into build + buildOrdering.
Note that since the tailoring code is not checked in yet, all tailorings are identical
to root.  The table therefore should not and does not grow at this point.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
